attributes.action: Lock Ken Livingston in the Tower of London and abolish the GLA mark 2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ken Livingston has done enough damage to London and has cost Londoners enough money. Had he been Mayor a few hundred years ago he may have been lynched and beheaded. This is a bit harsh, so we think it would be better to just lock him in the Tower until he promises to leave London alone. The GLA mark 2 is just another layer of bureaucracy costing more money, that the already heavily taxed Londoners have to finance. Get rid of it altogether.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
